name: EVO Survive
description:
EVO Survive is about a small life form that lives in the vortex of time. But not all other life forms are well-disposed towards it and it can only mess with the smaller ones in order to survive as long as possible.

GAME JAM 2022 - IN THE VORTEX OF TIME

TIP: Big eats Small - Survive as long as you can

The Artist: https://www.instagram.com/der.detail.spezialist/

The Coder: https://www.octomangames.com
